summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-ninth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks upon the west side of the street, between East Fifty-fifth Street and the north line of Shay's Addition, to the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 47269, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
